items.name: Valid Passport
items.description: Nigerian passport valid for duration of study programme plus additional months
items.personalizedDetail: Passport must be valid through at least June 20, 2027

items.name: CAS (Confirmation of Acceptance for Studies)
items.description: CAS reference number from University of London confirming unconditional offer and course details

items.name: English Language Proficiency
items.description: IELTS, TOEFL, or PTE score meeting university minimum (typically IELTS 6.0-6.5 for MSc)

items.name: Financial Evidence
items.description: Bank statements showing tuition fees + £1,334/month for 9 months living costs (London rate) held for 28 consecutive days
items.personalizedDetail: Minimum: tuition + £12,006 living costs, funds held for 28 days ending within 31 days of application

items.name: Academic Qualifications
items.description: Degree certificates and transcripts referenced in CAS (originals or certified copies)

items.name: Tuberculosis (TB) Test Certificate
items.description: TB test from an approved clinic in Nigeria (required for Nigerian nationals)

items.name: Personal Statement
items.description: Supporting statement explaining academic goals, career plans, and reasons for choosing the UK

items.name: Accommodation Proof
items.description: University accommodation offer or private rental agreement for initial period

items.name: Immigration Health Surcharge (IHS)
items.description: Payment of IHS at £776/year for duration of visa — paid online before biometric appointment

items.name: Biometric Appointment
items.description: Attend VFS Global centre in Lagos or Abuja for fingerprints and photograph

items.name: Passport-Sized Photographs
items.description: Two recent passport-sized photos meeting UK visa photo requirements — bring to appointment

fees.service: VFS Global Nigeria service charge + optional priority processing

processingTime: 3-6 weeks standard; 5 working days with priority service
applyAt: Online application via gov.uk, biometrics at VFS Global Lagos or Abuja
importantNotes: Apply no more than 6 months before course start date
Biometric appointment required at VFS Global centre
Can work up to 20 hours/week during term, full-time during holidays
Immigration Health Surcharge must be paid in full before visa appointment
Bank statements must show funds held for 28 consecutive days
All documents not in English must be translated by a certified translator
commonRejectionReasons: Funds not held for 28 consecutive days before application
CAS number invalid or course details don't match supporting documents
English language test score below required threshold
Gaps or inconsistencies in academic history

healthRequirements.note: Required for all Nigerian nationals — must be from an approved UK test centre in Nigeria
£776/year paid online before biometric appointment — covers NHS access

financialThresholds.notes: Funds must be held for 28 consecutive days; statement must end within 31 days of application date

alternativeVisaTypes.note: For courses under 6 months — no work permitted, no extension possible
For applicants aged 4-17 attending independent school

postArrivalRegistration.where: Local police station (required for Nigerian nationals staying 6+ months)

transitVisaInfo.warning: If connecting through another country en route to UK, check transit visa requirements separately — Nigerian passport holders need transit visas for many countries including some EU airports
